methods.name: setNow
methods.description_zh: 将模型更改为当前时刻

model-value.desc: Time of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

format24h.description: Forces 24 hour time display instead of AM/PM system
format24h.default: (based on Quasar lang language being used)
format24h.description_zh: 强制 24 小时时间显示，而不是 AM/PM 系统

default-date.description: The default date to use (in YYYY/MM/DD format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null)
default-date.description_zh: 模型未填充（未定义或空）时使用的默认日期（YYYY/MM/DD 格式）

options.description: Optionally configure what time is the user allowed to set; Overridden by 'hour-options', 'minute-options' and 'second-options' if those are set; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的时间;如果设置了“小时选项”、“分钟选项”和“第二选项”，则覆盖这些选项;为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，不要以内联方式定义它

hour-options.description: Optionally configure what hours is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
hour-options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的小时数;覆盖 'options' 道具（如果也设置了）

minute-options.description: Optionally configure what minutes is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
minute-options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的分钟数;覆盖 'options' 道具（如果也设置了）

second-options.description: Optionally configure what seconds is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
second-options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的秒数;覆盖 'options' 道具（如果也设置了）

with-seconds.description: Allow the time to be set with seconds
with-seconds.description_zh: 允许以秒为单位设置时间

now-btn.description: Display a button that selects the current time
now-btn.description_zh: 显示一个选择当前时间的按钮
